title: A Urgot Rework Idea I think needs more attention

embed.description: Haven't thought of any spell names yeht or the spell numbers either, sorry :( Q - launches a missile like object that spreads into smaller missile objects the more enemy champions, or creeps's it collides with. (Colliding Q with creeps, reduces each missile damage by 5%, and can only ap

body: Although the W of the kit seems rather overloaded, the rest of the kit seems suitable for league, unique and most of all fun, and great synergy across the abilities. One thing is the champion rework is lacking understandable explanations for the ability descriptions (especially the ultimate as mentioned) lel..
